name: iota (itch)
description:
iota A same screen multiplayer game.

NOTE: This can only be played with Xbox 360 or Xbox One controllers.

Players are to consume one another to become the largest and last surviving entity.

 

Playable from 2 to 4 players.

The game was completed under two months, it was an exercise for me to create something with the particle system within Unity.

Music by Hamish Lang - www.facebook.com/hamishlangmusic
